title: Reinstall Without Losing Saved Mail?
content:
I've been living with the inability to send email from Thunderbird since early July and it has been very inconvenient. I've tried the various remedies suggested on relevant threads, to no avail. All that I can think of is to reinstall Thunderbird, but I have lots of emails saved in folders that I don't want to lose.

Is there a way to reinstall Thunderbird without losing all of my saved emails?

Thanks.
creator: khq0660
